content:
Sean can students participate to ? or they have to be specialists in writing documentations? I have some friends who are students and interested in participation.

@Louis Googl I believe the intention is for them to be professional writers already, but you'd have to read the program rules regarding eligibility. Not sure what the requirements are yet.
"Able to demonstrate prior technical writing experience by submitting role descriptions and work samples."
So yeah, they really would need to have significant prior writing experience.
@Daniel Rossberg @Sean thank you very much .
